alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:32AM CDT until May 11 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Valley Park. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.9 feet, Yarnell Road is closed at Riverside Drive. Larkin Williams is closed at Riverside Golf Club entrance. In Valley Park...Tree Court Industrial Road begins flooding between Marshall Road and Scarlet Oak Boulevard. Also... the golf course at Family Golf and Learning Center and the Kirkwood Athletic Association ball fields begin flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Monday was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Meramec River Valley Park 18.0 21.6 18.7 12.0 8.5 6.5 5.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
